_header: Mary so mild and good of fame
Subjects: Virgin Mary, hymns to; carols, Nativity
_description: A hymn to the Virgin Mary by James Ryman — seven quatrains (abab) and burden (cc): ‘Mary so myelde of hert & myende / Hath borne a child to save mankyende’

CULEe112.First Lines:
Mary so myelde and good of fameBy vertu of the holy
                    goost…
CULEe112.Last Lines:
…That shall bringe vs at domes dayffro thraldom peyn woo and
                    distresse
